name: Colorful Puzzle
description:
Game Description: All over the world classic hexagon Russian mobile phone game.

Game Features: Global initiative challenge system,strategy game that lies fallow easily.Super simple UI style and slow and elegant music melody,there is no limit to the time constraints,you can always play games.

Playing Method:Choose one from three graphical drag and drop into the honeycomb and any direction by fill the grid,automatically eliminated,players score at the same time,eliminate the more,the higher the scoreyou get,if there is no place of space,the game ends.
